skillTree.name: Dark Steed
skillTree.description: True horses no longer, Dark Magic corrupts the finest Elven steeds and turns them into black-flanked killers.

skillTree.name: Cold One
skillTree.description: Dark, feral beasts indigenous to Naggaroth, tempted from their damp, warm caves to bear the Druchii to battle.

skillTree.name: Cold One Chariot
skillTree.description: Magnificent chariots, gifted to those who have impressed with their devotion, bravery and prowess in battle.

skillTree.name: Dark Pegasus
skillTree.description: The corrupted Dark Pegasi fly south from the Chaos Wastes to Naggaroth's Iron Mountains to make their nests.

skillTree.name: Ward of Khaine
skillTree.description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Noble-Born Ruler
skillTree.description: It is often the arrogant pursuit of their own unique enthusiasms and ambitions that distinguishes the noble-born from the low-born.

skillTree.name: Sycophantic Schemer
skillTree.description: Those with darkest, most self-serving ambitions will always find a way to see them through to fruition.

skillTree.name: Weakness Abhorred
skillTree.description: Reaching any position of power is an indication of great strength in Druchii society, for they do not tolerate nor risk a weakling’s presence.

skillTree.name: Martial Name of Power
skillTree.description: This one has adopted a warrior name to strike fear into enemy hearts, a moniker backed up by their deeds in battle.

effects.description: Choose a Name of Power that improves the Characters's own combat skills

skillTree.name: Scent of the Cold-Blooded
skillTree.description: Cold One Knights must embrocate their flesh with the beasts' slime, until one can no longer distinguish rider from mount.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +5% for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units

skillTree.name: Indomitable Will
skillTree.description: It is not possible to defeat such unshakeable spirit once its owner's mind is made up.

skillTree.name: Conqueror
skillTree.description: Kill many and you *are* a conqueror; godhood is then but a protracted slaughter away...

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Above Suspicion
skillTree.description: I serve my lord with undying loyalty.

skillTree.name: Knightly Prestige
skillTree.description: A most honourable, celebrated noble.

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -1% for cavalry units
Vigour loss reduction: -3% for cavalry units
Vigour loss reduction: -5% for cavalry units

skillTree.name: Pain Compliance
skillTree.description: Every Druchii knows the pain of the lash, and remembers the sting long after.

skillTree.name: Trusted Retainer
skillTree.description: My lord, any signs of weakness or failure would remain strictly confidential.

skillTree.name: Tested
skillTree.description: Time and again, I have succeeded where countless others have fallen.

skillTree.name: Show No Weakness
skillTree.description: It matters not how large, nor how ferocious. I will kill anything my lord requires.

skillTree.name: Absolute Precision
skillTree.description: Failure will not be tolerated.

ui_effects.description: ➕100% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 1 entity per second

skillTree.name: Tough as Nails
skillTree.description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.

skillTree.name: Intimidating
skillTree.description: You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! It’s just going to make me mad.

skillTree.name: Hero
skillTree.description: Onwards! To war, and victory!

skillTree.name: Retinue: Bard
skillTree.description: The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.

skillTree.name: Esteemed Combatant
skillTree.description: You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Trainer
skillTree.description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 25
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 100

skillTree.name: Stimulate Growth
skillTree.description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 2% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

skillTree.name: Cruel
skillTree.description: To cause another's suffering, to delight in their pain, to extend their agony according to your whim. That is power.

skillTree.name: Malevolent
skillTree.description: Evil-minded, poisonous malignancy. For its own sake.

skillTree.name: Malicious
skillTree.description: When this one is abroad you can be sure that malice is borne towards anyone and everyone.

effects.description: Construction cost: -25% for Cult of Khaine or Cult of Pleasure buildings
Hero recruit rank: +2 for Death Hags

skillTree.name: Spiteful
skillTree.description: Behind every thought they have - and every deed - is shameless, full-blooded spite.

skillTree.name: Vicious
skillTree.description: "Some folk call me vicious. I'll scoop out the eyes of any who utter it in my presence."

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

skillTree.name: Cunning
skillTree.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

skillTree.name: Determined
skillTree.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

skillTree.name: Confident
skillTree.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

skillTree.name: Disciplined
skillTree.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

skillTree.name: Perceptive
skillTree.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

skillTree.name: Aggressive
skillTree.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

skillTree.name: Tough
skillTree.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

skillTree.name: Strong
skillTree.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

skillTree.name: Weapon Master
skillTree.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

skillTree.name: Strategist
skillTree.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

skillTree.name: Tactician
skillTree.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
